statements: SELECT * FROM costume_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT costume_id, costume_name FROM costume_inventory WHERE size = 'Small';
SELECT costume_id, costume_name, style FROM costume_inventory WHERE size = 'Medium' ORDER BY costume_name DESC;
SELECT costume_name, size FROM costume_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE AND style = 'Pirate';
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory WHERE costume_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT costume_name, style FROM costume_inventory WHERE size = 'M' ORDER BY costume_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory WHERE availability = FALSE AND size IN ('S', 'L') ORDER BY costume_name;
SELECT costume_name, size, style FROM costume_inventory WHERE style LIKE '%Pirate%' ORDER BY size, costume_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_costumes, AVG(LENGTH(costume_name)) AS avg_name_length FROM costume_inventory;
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory;
SELECT costume_id, costume_name, size FROM costume_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT costume_name FROM costume_inventory ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_schedule WHERE performance_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT performance_time, venue FROM performance_schedule WHERE performance_date = '2022-12-31' AND venue = 'Theater A';
SELECT costume_id, costume_name FROM costume_inventory WHERE size = 'Medium' ORDER BY costume_name DESC
SELECT costume_name, size FROM costume_inventory WHERE availability = true ORDER BY costume_id ASC
SELECT * FROM performance_schedule WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND performance_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY performance_date, performance_time ASC
SELECT costume_name, style FROM costume_inventory WHERE size = 'Large' AND availability = false
SELECT performance_time, venue FROM performance_schedule WHERE venue = 'Theater A'
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, size FROM costume_inventory WHERE style = 'Pirate' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT performance_date, start_time, end_time, location FROM performance_schedule WHERE location LIKE '%Theater%';
SELECT style_name FROM dance_styles WHERE style_name LIKE '%Hip Hop%' ORDER BY style_name ASC;
SELECT name, size, style FROM costume_inventory WHERE size IN ('S', 'M', 'L') AND availability = TRUE ORDER BY name, size DESC;
SELECT id, name, size, availability, style FROM costume_inventory WHERE size='M' AND availability=true;
SELECT style_name FROM dance_styles ORDER BY style_name ASC;
SELECT id, name, size, availability FROM costume_inventory WHERE style='Ballet' AND availability=true;
SELECT performance_date, start_time, end_time, location FROM performance_schedule ORDER BY performance_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT style FROM costume_inventory ORDER BY style DESC;
SELECT id, style, size, availability FROM costumes;
SELECT performance_date, location, id FROM dance_performances ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM costume_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 AND location = 'Main Warehouse';
SELECT performance_id, costume_id, quantity_needed FROM performance_costume_mapping WHERE quantity_needed >= 5;
SELECT style, size, availability FROM costumes WHERE style LIKE '%Superhero%' ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT * FROM costumes WHERE availability = TRUE
SELECT style, size FROM costumes ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT performance_date, location FROM dance_performances WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT c.style, ci.quantity FROM costumes c JOIN costume_inventory ci ON c.id = ci.costume_id WHERE ci.quantity > 10
SELECT pc.performance_id, c.style, pc.quantity_needed FROM performance_costume_mapping pc JOIN costumes c ON pc.costume_id = c.id
SELECT * FROM CostumeInventory;
SELECT costume_name, size, style FROM CostumeInventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT costume_name, size, style FROM CostumeInventory ORDER BY costume_name DESC;
SELECT performance_name, date, location FROM DancePerformances WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT style_name, color, material FROM CostumeStyles WHERE color = 'Red';
SELECT * FROM CostumeInventory;
SELECT costume_name, size FROM CostumeInventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT performance_name, location, date FROM DancePerformances ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT style_name, color FROM CostumeStyles WHERE material = 'Cotton';

SELECT c.costume_name, s.size_value, cs.style_name, ca.available_quantity FROM CostumeInventory c JOIN CostumeSizes s ON c.size = s.size_value JOIN CostumeStyles cs ON c.style = cs.style_name JOIN CostumeAvailability ca ON c.costume_id = ca.costume_id WHERE ca.available_quantity > 0;
